name: Winter X Games SnoCross
overview: SnoCross is the latest racer from Raw Thrills. SnoCross has 6 snowmobile racers, 6 killer sleds, and insane custom upgrades. Plus travel the world by riding on 7 intense tracks in France, Antarctica, China, Alaska, Washington D.C., Moscow and Colorado. This game is officially licensed from ESPN and racers are able to perform the same sick tricks as seen in the X Games. Huge airtime gives you even more time to try crazy tricks. Throw snowballs at your opponents to battle for the lead.
